trans-unit.source: Implements a markup extension that describes the location of the binding source relative to the position of the binding target.
One of the ways to specify a binding source is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
This is the property type of that property.
<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource> is simultaneously a markup extension implementation and a data object.
When the extension returns itself (see <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.ProvideValue%2A>), the relevant information is contained in the data.

The main purpose of the markup extension is to allow a variable-argument constructor syntax in attribute form, so that the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.FindAncestor> mode can be defined inline with the two extra arguments for ancestor type and level that the other modes do not require.
For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md).
XAML Text Usage
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"></xref> class with an initial mode.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode"></xref> values.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"></xref> class with an initial mode and additional tree-walking qualifiers for finding the desired relative source.
`ancestorType` and `ancestorLevel` have no relevance if given as parameters for a `mode` other than <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.FindAncestor>.
Do not use this signature for the other <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode> values.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode"></xref> values.
For this signature to be relevant, this should be <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.FindAncestor"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of ancestor to look for.
The ordinal position of the desired ancestor among all ancestors of the given type.
Gets or sets the level of ancestor to look for, in <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.FindAncestor"></xref> mode.
Use 1 to indicate the one nearest to the binding target element.

If the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.Mode%2A> property is not set explicitly, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorLevel%2A> property will implicitly lock the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.Mode%2A> property value to <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.FindAncestor>.
XAML Text Usage
For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md).
The ancestor level.
Use 1 to indicate the one nearest to the binding target element.
Gets or sets the type of ancestor to look for.

If the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.Mode%2A> property is not set explicitly, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorLevel%2A> property will implicitly lock the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.Mode%2A> property value to <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.FindAncestor>.
XAML Text Usage
For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md).
The type of ancestor.
The default value is `null`.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"></xref> is not in the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.FindAncestor"></xref> mode.
Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode"></xref> value that describes the location of the binding source relative to the position of the binding target.
This property is read-only after initialization.

If this property is not set explicitly, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorLevel%2A> properties will implicitly lock this property value to <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.FindAncestor>.
XAML Text Usage
For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md).
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode"></xref> values.
The default value is `null`.
This property is immutable after initialization.

Instead of changing the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.Mode"></xref> on this instance, create a new <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"></xref> or use a different static instance.
Gets a static value that is used to return a <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"></xref> constructed for the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.PreviousData"></xref> mode.

Three of the four <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode> values, <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.PreviousData>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.Self>, or <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.TemplatedParent>, can produce a <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource> that is wholly static, containing no unique private values.
All uses of the static property can share the same object, eliminating the need to allocate separate objects for each use.
Therefore, using the static property reduces memory usage.
XAML Text Usage
For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md).
A static <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"></xref>.
Returns an object that should be set as the value on the target object's property for this markup extension.
For <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"></xref>, this is another <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"></xref>, using the appropriate source for the specified mode.
<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource> is simultaneously a markup extension implementation and a data object.
When the extension returns itself, the relevant information is contained in the data.

The main purpose of the markup extension is to allow a variable-argument constructor syntax in attribute form so that the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.FindAncestor> mode can be defined inline, with the two extra arguments for ancestor type and level that the other modes do not require.
An object that can provide services for the markup extension.
In this implementation, this parameter can be `null`.
Another <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"></xref>.
Gets a static value that is used to return a <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"></xref> constructed for the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.Self"></xref> mode.

Three of the four <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode> values, <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.PreviousData>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.Self>, or <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.TemplatedParent>, can produce a <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource> that is wholly static, containing no unique private values.
All uses of the static property can share the same object, eliminating the need to allocate separate objects for each use.
Therefore, using the static property reduces memory usage.
XAML Text Usage
For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md).
A static <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"></xref>.
Indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorLevel"></xref> property should be persisted.
This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorLevel%2A> property does not have a simple default value.
This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value.

You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource> or developing your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource>.
`true` if the property value has changed from its default; otherwise, `false`.
Indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType"></xref> property should be persisted.
This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType%2A> property does not have a simple default value.
This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value.

You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource> or developing your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource>.

For more information, see [Defining Default Values with the ShouldSerialize and Reset Methods](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/defining-default-values-with-the-shouldserialize-and-reset-methods.md).
`true` if the property value has changed from its default; otherwise, `false`.

Gets a static value that is used to return a <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"></xref> constructed for the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.TemplatedParent"></xref> mode.

Three of the four <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode> values, <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.PreviousData>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.Self>, or <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.TemplatedParent>, can produce a <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource> that is wholly static, containing no unique private values.
All uses of the static property can share the same object, eliminating the need to allocate separate objects for each use.
Therefore, using the static property reduces memory usage.
XAML Text Usage
For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md).
A static <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"></xref>.
This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
